snippet.title: Demo: Dormitory Love spring+summer・アル管理人の恋 spring+summer
snippet.description:
Demo for a fully-voiced Japanese otome game, Dormitory Love spring+summer, currently in development by Hase im Haus to be released on Windows.

*Synopsis*
"Jun Minase (default name, customisable) is suddenly in charge of Shirakaba House, a dormitory full of foreign exchange students after the former manager is unable to resume his duties.

How would all these foreign exchange students manage with each other under one roof? Would there ever be peaceful days for Jun?"

Japanese demo: https://www.hase-im-haus.com/game/dormitory-love/spring-summer-%E4%BD%93%E9%A8%93%E7%89%88/
Read the English translation (WIP): https://wrathofthesevenseas.tumblr.com/post/617740165931286528/spring-summer-common-intro-prologue

Note: 15:50 onwards is where the group and Jun (MC) are enjoying a flower-viewing party of their own.

Hase im Haus (Mirin)様の「アル管理人の恋 spring+summer」リメイク版の体験版動画。ボイス付き。

Hase im Haus (Mirin) on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mirin36
Pixiv Fanbox: https://mirin3.fanbox.cc/
Official site: https://www.hase-im-haus.com/

An English translation is in-progress by Amaya (Twitter @aheadofthenight)
Read the latest WIPs: https://wrathofthesevenseas.tumblr.com/
Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/amaya
